Verses: 1 vidhaiyadikkappattavanum, Kosamarupattavanum Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaagaadhu.
2 vesippillaiyum Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaagaadhu; Avanukkup Paththaam Thalaimuraiyaanavanum Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaagaadhu.
3 ammoniyanum Movaabiyanum Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaagaadhu; Paththaam Thalaimuraiyilum Endraikkum Avargal Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaagaadhu.

4 neengal Egipthilirundhu Purappattuvarugira Vazhiyile, Avargal Appaththodum Thanneerodum Ungalukku Edhirkondu Varaadhadhinimiththamum, Unnaich Sabikkumbadiyaai Mesoppoththaamiyaavin Ooraagiya Peththorilirundha Peyorin Kumaaran Pileyaamukkuk Koolipesi Avanai Azhaippiththadhinimiththamum Ippadich Seyyavendum.

5 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Pileyaamukkuch Sevikodukkach Siththamillaamal, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unmel Anbukoorndhabadiyinaal, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Andhach Saabaththai Unakku Aaseervaadhamaaga Maarappanninaar.
6 nee Un Aayulnaatkalullalavum Orukkaalum Avargal Samaadhaanaththaiyum Nanmaiyaiyum Thedaadhe.
7 edhomiyanai Aruvarukkaayaaga, Avan Un Sagodharan; Egipthiyanai Aruvarukkaayaaga, Avan Dhesaththile Paradhesiyaayirundhaai.
8 moondraam Thalaimuraiyil Avargalukkup Pirandha Pillaigal Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Udpadalaam.
9 nee Padaiyeduththu Un Saththurukkalukku Virodhamaaip Purappadumbodhu, Theetaana Kaariyangal Ellaavatrirkum Vilagiyiruppaayaaga.
10 rbaakkaalaththil Samaviththa Theettinaale Asuththamaayirukkira Oruvan Ungalilirundhaal, Avan Paalayaththirku Veliye Poi, Paalayaththirkul Varaamal,
11 saayangaalaththile Jalaththil Snaanampanni, Sooriyan Asthamikkumpodhu Paalayaththirkul Varakkadavan.
12 nee Velikkup Poyirukkaththakka Idam Paalayaththirkup Purambe Irukkavendum.
13 un Aayudhangalode Oru Sirukolum Unnidaththil Irukkakkadavadhu; Nee Malajalaadhikkup Pogumpodhu, Adhanaal Mannaith Thondi, Malajalaadhikkirundhu, Unnilirundhu Kazhindhuponadhai Moodippodakkadavaai.

14 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnai Ratchikkavum, Un Saththurukkalai Unakku Oppukkodukkavum, Un Paalayaththirkulle Ulaavikkondirukkiraar; Aagaiyaal, Avar Unnidaththil Asusiyaana Kaariyaththaik Kandu, Unnaivittup Pogaadhabadikku, Un Paalayam Suththamaayirukkakkadavadhu.
15 than Ejamaanukkuth Thappi Unnidaththil Vandha Velaikkaaranai Avanudaiya Ejamaan Kaiyil Oppukkodaayaaga.
16 avan Unakku Irukkira Un Vaasalgal Ondrile Thanakkuch Sammadhiyaana Idaththaith Therindhukondu, Adhile Unnudane Iruppaanaaga; Avanai Odukkavendaam.
17 isravelin Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyum Vesiyaayirukkak Koodaadhu; Isravelin Kumaararil Oruvanum Aanpunarchchikkaaranaayirukkak Koodaadhu.

18 vesippanayaththaiyum, Naayin Kirayaththaiyum Endhap Poruththanaiyinaalaagilum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththile Konduvaraayaaga; Avaigal Irandum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavaigal.
19 kadanaagak Kodukkira Panaththukkum Aagaaraththukkum, Kadanaagak Kodukkiravere Endhap Porulukkum, Un Sagodharan Kaiyil Vatti Vaangaayaaga.
20 anniyan Kaiyil Nee Vattivaangalaam; Nee Sudhandharikkappogira Dhesaththil Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Nee Kaiyidumvelaiyilellaam Unnai Aaseervadhikkumbadi Un Sagodharan Kaiyile Vattivaangaayaaga.
21 nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Poruththanai Panniyirundhaal, Adhaich Seluththath Thaamadhanjeyyaadhe; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Adhai Nichchayamaai Un Kaiyil Ketpaar; Adhu Unakkup Paavamaagum.
22 nee Poruththanaipannaadhirundhaal, Unmel Paavam Illai.
23 un Vaayinaal Sonnadhai Niraivetravendum; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Un Vaayinaal Nee Poruththanaipannich Sonna Urchaagabaliyaich Seluththith Theerppaayaaga.
24 nee Piranudaiya Thiraatchaththottaththil Piravesiththaal, Un Aasaitheera Thiraatchappazhangalaith Thirupthiyaagap Pusikkalaam; Un Koodaiyile Ondrum Eduththukkondu Pogak Koodaadhu.
25 piranudaiya Vilaichchalil Piravesiththaal, Un Kaiyinaal Kadhirgalaik Koiyalaam; Nee Andha Vilaichchalil Arivaalai Idalaagaadhu.
